# append(_:count:)

**Instance Method**

Appends the specified bytes from memory to the end of the data.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func append(_ bytes: UnsafePointer<UInt8>, count: Int)
```

## Adding Bytes

- **append(_:)**: Appends the specified data to the end of this data.
- **append(_:)**: Append a buffer of bytes to the data.
- **append(contentsOf:)**: Appends the bytes in the specified array to the end of the data.
